snippet.title: Gunman And The Witch - Beta 2.0 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Wild West City-Builder meets Top-Down Shooter!
Challenge your shooting and management skills in Gunman And The Witch.

Beta 2.0 is out now and you can play it for FREE on Itch.io and GameJolt. 

This version comes with 24 improvements including a fully-integrated Learning Curve system that will guide you along with the tutorials to make it easier to understand the fundamental of the game. 

For Steam Early-Access, we have postponed the release date to January 2020 with more content and improvements to the game. So, please stay tuned for future updates in 2020!

Wishing you a happy new year.

Play now for free:
Itch.io : https://phanphantz.itch.io/gatw
GameJolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/gunman/442025

Follow us on 

Twitter :
https://twitter.com/Gunman00350340

Facebook :
https://www.facebook.com/GunmanAndTheWitch/
